title: There's something wrong with my game.
body: Please help. My game keeps resetting my progress. I start a game, get a bunch of gold and items, get some levels, usually to 15 or 16, then we win or lose. That's all normal, but then, in the next game I play, I'm back at level 1 with much less gold and no items! I don't know what is wrong, but I can't keep my stuff and levels across games...

replies.body: Hi there, every match starts your champion at level 1 as you may your way leveling up and grabbing items towards the end game.  Your account level is totally separate, and is at level 30.  Our recently [updated new player guide ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/new-player-guide#/?_k=eolhok)may offer more info!
It took you 39 levels to figure this out?
